column5: Quiet and Cozy 4 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath home in the heart of Spring, Texas only a 20-30 minutes north of Houston. Our home is located in an established and safe community just a short mile east of Interstate 45 and a five minute drive to Old Town Spring, Splash Town, restaurants and shopping area. We offer a cozy wood-burning fireplace, washer/dryer, access to common living areas, entertainment, & internet. A perfect solution for those who enjoy cooking, relaxing & vacationing in a home setting.
column8: Warm and Comfortable Home in Spring, Texas
